page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The majority of adults interviewed in Over are in full time employment.Most people leave the village to work, the majority of whom work in Cambridge or in one of the surrounding villages. Some commute to London, and others travel all over the country. One quarter of those interviewed are employed on the (small) industrial estate on the outskirts, or at one of the local pubs, shops or offices. Many{local businesses}such as the Printers, Secretarial Services and Farms are owned by people living in the village and employ local labour or workers from neighbouring villages. Another quarter of the people interviewed are in{self-employment as shop keepers, builders and market gardeners.
